Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience in developing dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. My expertise lies in creating efficient systems, intuitive user interfaces, and innovative solutions to enhance web experiences. I am passionate about writing clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, adhering to best practices and modern development standards to deliver high-quality front-end solutions. As a Full Stack Developer, I specialize in developing web applications using Angular, Spring Boot, and MySQL, ensuring seamless integration between front-end and back-end technologies to create efficient and dynamic user experiences.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: CO-OPTEX
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developing a web application to efficiently suggest and manage the COOPTEX Retail Application, a comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. The application oversees the flow of supplies through all stages of the production cycle. This includes implementing robust back-end functionality using Java Spring Boot for managing business logic, ensuring seamless data flow, and creating secure REST APIs for integration across modules. Additionally, optimizing the front-end with Angular to deliver a responsive and user-friendly interface for streamlined operations.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: THE STELLA
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: The Stella E-Commerce System is a comprehensive and dynamic web-based application designed to revolutionize the online shopping experience. Built using Angular for the front end, it provides an interactive and user-friendly interface, ensuring seamless navigation and product discovery for customers. The back end, developed with Java Spring Boot, powers the system with secure REST APIs for efficient order management, payment processing, and inventory tracking. Designed as a freelance project, this solution enables businesses to showcase and sell their products online while optimizing backend processes like product catalog management, user authentication, and sales analytics.
